thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: SARAH BEE
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by SARAH BEE

author: SARAH BEE
title: SARAH BEE
text:
I ordered some astros and a schoolbag for my daughter on Monday late afternoon/early evening and had 29 minutes before the 'next day delivery' deadline was reached.
I couldn't believe it when at about 8.15am on Tuesday the delivery guy called me to say he was on his way and just needed directions to our house.
Absolutely fantastic service!
And the astros were too small in the end so I brought them to a Lifestyle Sports store where there was no problem exchanging them.
I would HIGHLY recommend using Lifestyle
Sports online store.
